titleStmt.title: The true relation of the late & happie victorie, obtained by the Marques of Montrose his Excellencie, His Majesties Lieuetenant, and Generall Governour of the kingdom of Scotland against General Lieuetenant Baylie, and others of the rebels, at Kilsyth, 15 August, 1645.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, torn, faded print with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
